title: Strategies
allPeriodsAndAccounts: All periods and all accounts combined
noDataForPeriod: No data available for the selected period.
strategyRespectPercentageTooltip: This chart shows the percentage of respected and non-respected trades relative to the total number of trades for each period. The blue bar represents the % of trades where the strategy was respected, the pink bar represents the % of trades where the strategy was not respected.
successRateByStrategyRespectTooltip: This chart compares the success rate (winning trades) depending on whether the strategy was respected or not. The blue bar shows the % of winning trades when the strategy is respected, the pink bar shows the % of winning trades when the strategy is not respected.
winningSessionsDistribution: Distribution of winning sessions by TP reached
winningSessionsDistributionTooltip: This chart shows how winning sessions (profitable trades) are distributed according to the Take Profit reached. TP1: the first Take Profit was reached (regardless of whether TP2+ is also reached). TP2+: the second Take Profit or more was reached. Break-even: no Take Profit was reached but the trade is still profitable.
dominantEmotionsDistributionTooltip: This chart shows the distribution of dominant emotions felt during trades. Each segment represents the number of occurrences of an emotion. This helps identify the most frequent emotions during your trading sessions.
complianceEvolutionAllAccountsTooltip: Evolution of respect rate, calculated from individual strategies and respects (each strategy or respect counts as one unit). The blue curve represents the daily rate, while the pink dashed line corresponds to the cumulative average since the beginning. This calculation differs from the daily respect rate displayed at the top of the page.
complianceEvolutionSelectedAccountToolti: Evolution of respect rate, calculated from individual strategies and respects (each strategy or respect counts as one unit). The blue curve represents the daily rate, while the pink dashed line corresponds to the cumulative average since the beginning. This calculation differs from the daily respect rate displayed at the top of the page.
noDataForAccount: No data available for this account
complianceByWeekday: Strategy Compliance by Day of Week
complianceByWeekdayTooltip: Average respect rate for each day of the week. Blue days are when you respect your strategy best, pink days need improvement.
